item.description:
Hello photographers!

So you guys don't want to meet on Thanksgiving huh? Guess we should consider moving our day up a week? What do you all think? Does the 18th work for everyone?? So let's plan from 7:30 to 8:00 will be open and social! Hanging out chit chatting will be encouraged!

The from 8:00 to 9:00 we will have a more organized agenda. A topic, a presentation, a group sharing of images, something related to Photography!

This month: Let's talk about or favorite photo books and magazines! this is always a fun topic and we get to see what kind of stuff you enjoy the most. Bring anything you'd like to share with others!

Going forward we will be asking for a donation at the meetups of $5.00 to cover costs. However it's not manditory to attend - just please donate if you can...

Cheers,
Donna
item.how_to_find_us: Scott and I are always to try to greet everyone who comes to the meetups. We'll

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP
